data.eml:eml: The Types of Phasmida in the Zoological Institute, Russian Academy of Sciences, St. Petersburg (ZMAS)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Brock, Paul D. (2007): The Types of Phasmida in the Zoological Institute, Russian Academy of Sciences, St. Petersburg (ZMAS). Zootaxa 1398: 45-56, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.175361
